conbody.p: You will need a few items to successfully clean and maintain your Smith-Corona typewriter:

ul.li: A portable manual Smith Corona Sterling typewriter
Access to direct sunlight for drying purposes
Compressed air and thin nozzle attachments
This can be in the form of an air can or machine air compressor
Multiple (3+) lint-free rags such as microfiber towels
Bottle with nozzle head or dropper bottle
Soft-bristle brush (a car detailing brush or toothbrush can be used)
Alternative: gentle degreaser or rubbing alcohol
Cleaning solution (mild soap and water is ideal, but all-purpose cleaners and detergents can be used)
Light-weight oil (sewing machine oil, gun oil, and specialized typewriter oil are acceptable)
Plastic sheeting or paper towels for work-surface protection
